verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> Let God <S%H430><s%> arise, <S%H6965><s%> let his enemies <S%H341><s%> be scattered: <S%H6327><s%> let them also that hate <S%H8130><s%> him flee <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.

As smoke <S%H6227><s%> is driven away, <S%H5086><s%> so drive them away: <S%H5086><s%> as wax <S%H1749><s%> melteth <S%H4549><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> so let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> at the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
But let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> be glad; <S%H8055><s%> let them rejoice <S%H5970><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God: <S%H430><s%> yea, let them exceedingly <S%H8057><s%> rejoice. <S%H7797><s%>

Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto God, <S%H430><s%> sing praises <S%H2167><s%> to his name: <S%H8034><s%> extol <S%H5549><s%> him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> upon the heavens <S%H6160><s%> by his name <S%H8034><s%> JAH, <S%H3050><s%> and rejoice <S%H5937><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.
A father <S%H1><s%> of the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and a judge <S%H1781><s%> of the widows, <S%H490><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> in his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H4583><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> setteth <S%H3427><s%> the solitary <S%H3173><s%> in families: <S%H1004><s%> he bringeth out <S%H3318><s%> those which are bound <S%H615><s%> with chains: <S%H3574><s%> but <S%H389><s%> the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in a dry <S%H6707><s%> land.
O God, <S%H430><s%> when thou wentest forth <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thy people, <S%H5971><s%> when thou didst march <S%H6805><s%> through the wilderness; <S%H3452><s%> Selah: <S%H5542><s%>

The earth <S%H776><s%> shook, <S%H7493><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> also <S%H637><s%> dropped <S%H5197><s%> at the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> even Sinai <S%H5514><s%> itself <S%H2088><s%> was moved at the presence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thou, O God, <S%H430><s%> didst send <S%H5130><s%> a plentiful <S%H5071><s%> rain, <S%H1653><s%> whereby thou <S%H859><s%> didst confirm <S%H3559><s%> thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> when it was weary. <S%H3811><s%>
Thy congregation <S%H2416><s%> hath dwelt <S%H3427><s%> therein: thou, O God, <S%H430><s%> hast prepared <S%H3559><s%> of thy goodness <S%H2896><s%> for the poor. <S%H6041><s%>
The Lord <S%H136><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the word: <S%H562><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> was the company <S%H6635><s%> of those that published <S%H1319><s%> it.
Kings <S%H4428><s%> of armies <S%H6635><s%> did flee apace: <S%H5074><s%> <S%H5074><s%> and she that tarried <S%H5116><s%> at home <S%H1004><s%> divided <S%H2505><s%> the spoil. <S%H7998><s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> ye have lain <S%H7901><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the pots, <S%H8240><s%> yet shall ye be as the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a dove <S%H3123><s%> covered <S%H2645><s%> with silver, <S%H3701><s%> and her feathers <S%H84><s%> with yellow <S%H3422><s%> gold. <S%H2742><s%>
When the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> scattered <S%H6566><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> in it, it was white as snow <S%H7949><s%> in Salmon. <S%H6756><s%>
The hill <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> is as the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan; <S%H1316><s%> a high <S%H1386><s%> hill <S%H2022><s%> as the hill <S%H2022><s%> of Bashan. <S%H1316><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> leap <S%H7520><s%> ye, ye high <S%H1386><s%> hills? <S%H2022><s%> this is the hill <S%H2022><s%> which God <S%H430><s%> desireth <S%H2530><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in; yea, <S%H637><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in it forever. <S%H5331><s%>

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are twenty thousand, <S%H7239><s%> even thousands <S%H505><s%> of angels: <S%H8136><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> is among them, as in Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place.

Thou hast ascended <S%H5927><s%> on high, <S%H4791><s%> thou hast led captivity captive: <S%H7617><s%> <S%H7628><s%> thou hast received <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H4979><s%> for men; <S%H120><s%> yea, for the rebellious <S%H5637><s%> also, <S%H637><s%> that the LORD <S%H3050><s%> God <S%H430><s%> might dwell <S%H7931><s%> among them.

Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord, <S%H136><s%> who daily <S%H3117><s%> <S%H3117><s%> loadeth <S%H6006><s%> us with benefits, even the God <S%H410><s%> of our salvation. <S%H3444><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
He that is our God <S%H410><s%> is the God <S%H410><s%> of salvation; <S%H4190><s%> and unto GOD <S%H3069><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> belong the issues <S%H8444><s%> from death. <S%H4194><s%>

But <S%H389><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall wound <S%H4272><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his enemies, <S%H341><s%> and the hairy <S%H8181><s%> scalp <S%H6936><s%> of such a one as goeth on still <S%H1980><s%> in his trespasses. <S%H817><s%>

The Lord <S%H136><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will bring again <S%H7725><s%> from Bashan, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1316><s%> I will bring my people again <S%H7725><s%> from the depths <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4688><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> thy foot <S%H7272><s%> may be dipped <S%H4272><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thine enemies, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H341><s%> and the tongue <S%H3956><s%> of thy dogs <S%H3611><s%> in the same. <S%H4482><s%>
They have seen <S%H7200><s%> thy goings, <S%H1979><s%> O God; <S%H430><s%> even the goings <S%H1979><s%> of my God, <S%H410><s%> my King, <S%H4428><s%> in the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

The singers <S%H7891><s%> went before, <S%H6923><s%> the players on instruments <S%H5059><s%> followed after; <S%H310><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them were the damsels <S%H5959><s%> playing with timbrels. <S%H8608><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> ye God <S%H430><s%> in the congregations, <S%H4721><s%> even the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> from the fountain <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4726><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

There <S%H8033><s%> is little <S%H6810><s%> Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> with their ruler, <S%H7287><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and their council, <S%H7277><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Naphtali. <S%H5321><s%>
Thy God <S%H430><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> thy strength: <S%H5797><s%> strengthen, <S%H5810><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> that which <S%H2098><s%> thou hast wrought <S%H6466><s%> for us.
Because of thy temple <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1964><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall kings <S%H4428><s%> bring <S%H2986><s%> presents <S%H7862><s%> unto thee.

Rebuke <S%H1605><s%> the company <S%H2416><s%> of spearmen, <S%H7070><s%> the multitude <S%H5712><s%> of the bulls, <S%H47><s%> with the calves <S%H5695><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> till every one submit himself <S%H7511><s%> with pieces <S%H7518><s%> of silver: <S%H3701><s%> scatter <S%H967><s%> thou the people <S%H5971><s%> that delight <S%H2654><s%> in war. <S%H7128><s%>
Princes <S%H2831><s%> shall come out <S%H857><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> shall soon stretch out <S%H7323><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%> unto God. <S%H430><s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto God, <S%H430><s%> ye kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> O sing praises <S%H2167><s%> unto the Lord; <S%H136><s%> Selah: <S%H5542><s%>

To him that rideth <S%H7392><s%> upon the heavens <S%H8064><s%> of heavens, <S%H8064><s%> which were of old; <S%H6924><s%> lo, <S%H2005><s%> he doth send out <S%H5414><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and that a mighty <S%H5797><s%> voice. <S%H6963><s%>

Ascribe <S%H5414><s%> ye strength <S%H5797><s%> unto God: <S%H430><s%> his excellency <S%H1346><s%> is over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and his strength <S%H5797><s%> is in the clouds. <S%H7834><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> thou art terrible <S%H3372><s%> out of thy holy places: <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4720><s%> the God <S%H410><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is he <S%H1931><s%> that giveth <S%H5414><s%> strength <S%H5797><s%> and power <S%H8592><s%> unto his people. <S%H5971><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be God. <S%H430><s%>
